com.nutiteq.layers.vector.deprecated

Class Polygon3DDbLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nutiteq.layers.Layer
      • com.nutiteq.vectorlayers.VectorLayer<com.nutiteq.geometry.Polygon3D>
        • com.nutiteq.vectorlayers.Polygon3DLayer
          • com.nutiteq.layers.vector.deprecated.Polygon3DDbLayer
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class Polygon3DDbLayer
extends com.nutiteq.vectorlayers.Polygon3DLayer
    Simple layer of 3D Polygons, reads data from Spatialite table with 2D polygons
    Author:
    jaak

    • Constructor Detail

      • Polygon3DDbLayer

        public Polygon3DDbLayer(String dbPath,
                String tableName,
                String geomColumnName,
                String heightColumnName,
                float heightFactor,
                int maxObjects,
                com.nutiteq.style.StyleSet<com.nutiteq.style.Polygon3DStyle> styleSet)
                 throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        dbPath - Spatialite format database
        tableName - table with data
        geomColumnName - column in table with geometry
        heightColumnName - column in table with heigth in meters
        heightFactor - multiply height with this number to make it visible
        maxObjects - limit number of loaded objects, set to 500 e.g. to avoid out of memory
        styleSet - Polygon3DStyle styleset for visualisation
        Throws:
        IOException
